title: Patience and Prayer
arabicText: وَاسْتَعِينُوا بِالصَّبْرِ وَالصَّلَاةِ ۚ وَإِنَّهَا لَكَبِيرَةٌ إِلَّا عَلَى الْخَاشِعِينَ
transliteration: Wasta'eenoo bissabri wassalaah; wa innahaa lakabeeratun illaa 'alal khaashi'een
translation: And seek help through patience and prayer, and indeed, it is difficult except for the humbly submissive to Allah.

title: Trust in Allah
arabicText: وَمَن يَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى اللَّهِ فَهُوَ حَسْبُهُ
transliteration: Wa man yatawakkal 'alal laahi fahuwa hasbuh
translation: And whoever relies upon Allah - then He is sufficient for him.

title: Remember Allah
arabicText: فَاذْكُرُونِي أَذْكُرْكُمْ وَاشْكُرُوا لِي وَلَا تَكْفُرُونِ
transliteration: Fadhkurooneee adhkurkum washkuroo lee wa laa takfuroon
translation: So remember Me; I will remember you. And be grateful to Me and do not deny Me.

title: Ease After Hardship
arabicText: فَإِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا، إِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
transliteration: Fa inna ma'al 'usri yusra, inna ma'al 'usri yusra
translation: For indeed, with hardship comes ease. Indeed, with hardship comes ease.

title: Allah is Near
arabicText: وَإِذَا سَأَلَكَ عِبَادِي عَنِّي فَإِنِّي قَرِيبٌ ۖ أُجِيبُ دَعْوَةَ الدَّاعِ إِذَا دَعَانِ
transliteration: Wa idha sa-alaka 'ibaadee 'annee fa-innee qareeb; ujeebu da'watad daa'i idha da'aan
translation: And when My servants ask you concerning Me - indeed I am near. I respond to the invocation of the supplicant when he calls upon Me.

title: Divine Protection
arabicText: وَاللَّهُ خَيْرٌ حَافِظًا ۖ وَهُوَ أَرْحَمُ الرَّاحِمِينَ
transliteration: Wallaahu khayrun haafizaa; wa Huwa arhamur raahimeen
translation: And Allah is the best Guardian, and He is the Most Merciful of the merciful.

title: Good Deeds
arabicText: مَنْ عَمِلَ صَالِحًا مِّن ذَكَرٍ أَوْ أُنثَىٰ وَهُوَ مُؤْمِنٌ فَلَنُحْيِيَنَّهُ حَيَاةً طَيِّبَةً
transliteration: Man 'amila saalihan min dhakarin aw unthaa wa huwa mu'minun falanuhyiyannahu hayaatan tayyibah
translation: Whoever does righteousness, whether male or female, while being a believer - We will surely cause them to live a good life.

title: Forgiveness and Mercy
arabicText: قُلْ يَا عِبَادِيَ الَّذِينَ أَسْرَفُوا عَلَىٰ أَنفُسِهِمْ لَا تَقْنَطُوا مِن رَّحْمَةِ اللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يَغْفِرُ الذُّنُوبَ جَمِيعًا
transliteration: Qul yaa 'ibaadiyallazeena asrafoo 'alaaa anfusihim laa taqnatoo mir rahmatillaah; innallaaha yaghfirudh-dhunooba jamee'aa
translation: Say: O My servants who have transgressed against themselves, do not despair of the mercy of Allah. Indeed, Allah forgives all sins.

title: Wisdom in Adversity
arabicText: وَعَسَىٰ أَن تَكْرَهُوا شَيْئًا وَهُوَ خَيْرٌ لَّكُمْ ۖ وَعَسَىٰ أَن تُحِبُّوا شَيْئًا وَهُوَ شَرٌّ لَّكُمْ ۗ وَاللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ وَأَنتُمْ لَا تَعْلَمُونَ
transliteration: Wa 'asaaa an takrahoo shay'anw wa huwa khayrul lakum; wa 'asaaa an tuhibboo shay'anw wa huwa sharrul lakum; wallaahu ya'lamu wa antum laa ta'lamoon
translation: But perhaps you hate a thing and it is good for you; and perhaps you love a thing and it is bad for you. And Allah knows, while you know not.

title: Peace of Heart
translation: Verily, in the remembrance of Allah do hearts find rest.

title: Guidance and Light
arabicText: يَهْدِي بِهِ اللَّهُ مَنِ اتَّبَعَ رِضْوَانَهُ سُبُلَ السَّلَامِ وَيُخْرِجُهُم مِّنَ الظُّلُمَاتِ إِلَى النُّورِ
transliteration: Yahdee bihil laahu manit taba'a ridwaanahu subulas salaami wa yukhrijuhum minaz zulumaati ilan noor
translation: By which Allah guides those who pursue His pleasure to the ways of peace and brings them out from darknesses into the light.

title: Gratitude
translation: If you are grateful, I will surely increase you in favor.

title: Seeking Help
translation: It is You we worship and You we ask for help.

title: Charity and Kindness
arabicText: وَمَا تُنفِقُوا مِنْ خَيْرٍ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ بِهِ عَلِيمٌ
transliteration: Wa maa tunfiqoo min khayrin fa innallaaha bihee 'aleem
translation: And whatever you spend of good - indeed, Allah is Knowing of it.

title: Contentment
arabicText: وَمَن يَتَّقِ اللَّهَ يَجْعَل لَّهُ مَخْرَجًا وَيَرْزُقْهُ مِنْ حَيْثُ لَا يَحْتَسِبُ
transliteration: Wa many-yattaqil laaha yaj'al lahoo makhrajaa, wa yarzuqhu min haythu laa yahtasib
translation: And whoever fears Allah - He will make for him a way out, and will provide for him from where he does not expect.
